Description.Text: Centrally situated in Istanbul`s Karaköy quarter, the 4-star Haze Hotel is just a stone`s throw from the harbour. Enjoying excellent transport links, the location of the Haze Hotel allows visitors to easily move around this extraordinary city. Tourist sights such as Galata Tower, The Spice Bazaar, Tunel Metro are within easy walking distance whilst Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque are just a short tram ride away. Offering superior levels of accommodation, all guestrooms are generously appointed, individually designed and furnished with contemporary comfort in mind. Rich fabrics and warm colours complement the modern amenities that include LED satellite TV, minibar, wifi, hairdryer and work desk as standard. Perfectly suited for both business and leisure traveller alike, The Haze Karaköy is a superb choice for those in search of a great location and a high level of comfort
